purpose: To provide a framework for creating, managing, and deploying AI agents using JSON configurations.
principle: Utilizes JSON configurations to define and orchestrate AI agent behaviors and interactions.
reusability: Highly composable with JSON-based configuration files, allowing easy integration and customization of AI agents.
limitations: Limited to JSON-based configurations; complex behaviors may require extensive setup.
name: agents-json
highlight: A flexible framework for orchestrating and managing JSON-based AI agents.
